content: supplies & materials 75 yards worsted weight cotton yarn h/5 0 mm crochet hook scissors measuring tape yarn needle gauge 17 sts x 10 row =4 finished size 9 x 9 stitches & abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet skip skip single_crochet single_crochet sdc starting double_crochet notes written in us crochet terms the stitch count is listed at the end of each row a ch4 can be substituted for the sdc and ch1 at the beginning of even numbered row i d love to hear from you don t hesitate to contact me let me know what you re working on or designs you d like to see in the future use the links above or email me at crochetsbytrista@gmail com if you ve purchased my designs in the past leave a review i want to know what you think you may sell finished items made with my pattern i just ask that you credit the design to crochets by trista i can not offer any refunds on patterns due to it being a pdf download
